title: Horse Breeds Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of popular horse breeds and their characteristics

questions.question: Which horse breed, originating from Arabia, is known for its distinctive dished face profile, high tail carriage, and exceptional endurance?
Which large draft horse breed from Scotland has distinctive feathering on its lower legs and is often bay or brown in color?
Which American breed is famous for its spotted coat pattern and was historically associated with the Nez Perce people?
Which breed holds the record as the tallest horse breed in the world, often exceeding 17 hands tall?
Which breed, developed in England for horse racing, is considered the fastest breed over short to medium distances?
Which compact American breed was named after a schoolteacher and is known for its versatility and willingness to work?
Which breed from Spain is known for its elegant movements and has been used extensively in classical dressage?
Which breed is famous for being born dark and gradually turning white with age, and performs at the Spanish Riding School in Vienna?
Which American breed is known for its smooth, four-beat running walk gait that makes it extremely comfortable to ride?
Which breed from the Netherlands is recognized by its striking black coat, long flowing mane, and feathered feet?
Which small, hardy breed from the Shetland Islands is one of the strongest horse breeds relative to its size?
Which American breed is considered the fastest horse over a quarter-mile distance, giving it its name?
Which French draft breed is typically grey or black and was used as a war horse in the Middle Ages?
Which wild horse breed roams freely in the American West and is descended from horses brought by Spanish explorers?
